message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a one-time offer to you, Bob. I'll sell it to you for $900,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm offering you a discount from its true worth to you. If you're interested, let me know and we can finalize the deal. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
